channel.title: Tomb Raider
channel.description:
So since this is out in some months, I figured we needed a thread for it!
So what do you guys think about it? Does it need to be a game filled with a whole lot of mind-boggling puzzles like the previous games or an action game? (It looks like an action game tbh but we'll see).
